Judul: IMPLEMENTATION OF RESIDUAL INCOME METHOD: STUDY CASE PT. GARUDA INDONESIA (PERSERO), TBK
Abstrak:
After conducting Initial Public Offering (IPO) in 2011, Garuda Indonesia still recorded profits from fluctuating operating results. Even in 2014 and then Garuda Indonesia net profit up to -Rp 4.7 trillion. Garuda Indonesia's obstacles such as high operational costs, increased business competitiveness  between airlines and Garuda Indonesia's high dependence on suppliers, fluctuations in exchange rates, greatly disrupted Garuda Indonesia's financial performance. However, in 2016 Garuda Indonesia is  able to record net income even though it decreased from 2015.   

This study aims to further investigate the impact of Garuda Indonesia's financial performance on its stock value, identify external and internal conditions as well as describe related business risks that affect company performance and value. The study was conducted using Residual Income model.   

In 2017, the income of PT. Garuda Indonesia (Persero), Tbk is projected to increase by 5% from Rp 52 trillion in 2016 to 54 trillion. From the valuation results obtained Garuda Indonesia stock price of IDR 1078.35 in 2030. From the valuation results obtained conclusion that by predicting the increase in income and reduce  operational costs, Garuda Indonesia is able to generate a positive residual income in 2022. It is  expected that this final writing can be a consideration and input for Garuda Indonesia in order to generate a positive share price in the future front.
Kata Kunci: Garuda Indonesia, Finance, Residual Income, Valuation
